comments.body: This has an implicit assumption that offline_offsets is a list with length of tensor_count. Also if a tensor is not offline planned, the corresponding value is -1.   Any chance that we could add a comment somewhere?

`tensorflow/lite/micro/micro_allocator.cc:102:14: error: function 'CheckOfflinePlannedOffsets' is not needed and will not be emitted [-Werror,-Wunneeded-internal-declaration]
TfLiteStatus CheckOfflinePlannedOffsets(const Model* model,`

From what I could see when I tested it, that error showed up when using clang.
I solved it like this, which might not be optimal. What do you think about it?
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/38121/commits/bacc5e5927360ad119cdb9967d53df4c95c53fd4#diff-6dace628e5372fb3c3fbb76e0fd9d37aR97
